title: How To Watch The ‘SNL50’ Anniversary Concert And Three-Hour Special This Weekend
description: Valentine’s Day and President’s Day weekend marks the official celebration of Saturday Night Live’s landmark 50th season with an anniversary concert taking place Friday evening and a three-hour special episode airing Sunday, Feb 16. Find more details on how to watch the SNL anniversary concert and how to watch the SNL 50th anniversary show below: […]
author: Dessi Gomez
excerpt: 'Saturday Night Live' will celebrate its 50th anniversary Valentine's and President's Day weekend in February with a concert and three-hour special.
text: Valentine’s Day and President’s Day weekend marks the official celebration of Saturday Night Live’s landmark 50th season with an anniversary concert taking place Friday evening and a three-hour special episode airing Sunday, Feb 16. Find more details on how to watch the SNL anniversary concert and how to watch the SNL 50th anniversary show below: When is the Saturday Night Live Homecoming Concert? The concert takes place Valentine’s Day evening (Feb. 14) two days ahead of the 50th anniversary show. Where is SNL50: The Homecoming Concert streaming? The concert livestream will be available via Peacock Friday Feb. 14. Who is performing at the SNL anniversary concert? Performers include Jelly Roll, Brandi Carlile, Mumford & Sons, Miley Cyrus, Lady Gaga, Post Malone, Bad Bunny, Arcade Fire, Chris Martin, Backstreet Boys, Bonnie Raitt, David Byrne, Brittany Howard, Eddie Vedder, Devo, The Roots, Preservation Hall Jazz Band, Robyn, Jack White and The B-52s. Watch on Deadline RELATED: ‘SNL50: The Homecoming Concert’: Cher, Dave Grohl, Lauryn Hill, Snoop Dogg, St. Vincent & Wyclef Jean Join Performers Lineup Cher, Dave Grohl, Lauryn Hill, Snoop Dogg, St. Vincent and Wyclef Jean joined as a second round of announced performers. Jimmy Fallon will host the musical event. When does SNL50: The Anniversary Special air? The live three-hour telecast from Studio 8H in Rockefeller Center will take place Sunday, Feb. 16 at 8 p.m. ET/5 p.m. PT on NBC. Is the Saturday Night Live Anniversary Special streaming? There will be a simulcast of the three-hour episode available to livestream on Peacock. Who will be in the SNL Anniversary Special? Performers pulling double duty with the concert and the special episode include Bad Bunny and Miley Cyrus. Other celebrity appearances will include those of John Mulaney, Ayo Edebiri, Quinta Brunson, Tom Hanks, Sabrina Carpenter, Adam Driver, Dave Chappelle, Kim Kardashian, Woody Harrelson, Scarlett Johansson, Steve Martin, Martin Short, Paul Simon, Robert De Niro, Pedro Pascal and Peyton Manning. RELATED: ‘SNL50: The Anniversary Special’ Adds Adam Sandler, Amy Poehler, Chris Rock, Eddie Murphy & More Guests – Update Additional A-list appearances announced include those of Chris Rock, Tina Fey, Will Ferrell, Amy Poehler, Kristen Wiig, Adam Sandler, Seth Meyers, Pete Davidson, Maya Rudolph, Chevy Chase, Kate McKinnon, Molly Shannon, Jimmy Fallon, Eddie Murphy, Jason Sudeikis, Kenan Thompson, Fred Armisen, Garrett Morris, Laraine Newman, Will Forte, Tracy Morgan, Jane Curtain and more.
html:
Valentine’s Day and President’s Day weekend marks the official celebration of Saturday Night Live’s landmark 50th season with an anniversary concert taking place Friday evening and a three-hour special episode airing Sunday, Feb 16.

Find more details on how to watch the SNL anniversary concert and how to watch the SNL 50th anniversary show below:

When is the Saturday Night Live Homecoming Concert?

The concert takes place Valentine’s Day evening (Feb. 14) two days ahead of the 50th anniversary show.

Where is SNL50: The Homecoming Concert streaming?

The concert livestream will be available via Peacock Friday Feb. 14.

Who is performing at the SNL anniversary concert?

Performers include Jelly Roll, Brandi Carlile, Mumford & Sons, Miley Cyrus, Lady Gaga, Post Malone, Bad Bunny, Arcade Fire, Chris Martin, Backstreet Boys, Bonnie Raitt, David Byrne, Brittany Howard, Eddie Vedder, Devo, The Roots, Preservation Hall Jazz Band, Robyn, Jack White and The B-52s.

Watch on Deadline

RELATED: ‘SNL50: The Homecoming Concert’: Cher, Dave Grohl, Lauryn Hill, Snoop Dogg, St. Vincent & Wyclef Jean Join Performers Lineup

Cher, Dave Grohl, Lauryn Hill, Snoop Dogg, St. Vincent and Wyclef Jean joined as a second round of announced performers.

Jimmy Fallon will host the musical event.

When does SNL50: The Anniversary Special air?

The live three-hour telecast from Studio 8H in Rockefeller Center will take place Sunday, Feb. 16 at 8 p.m. ET/5 p.m. PT on NBC.

Is the Saturday Night Live Anniversary Special streaming?

There will be a simulcast of the three-hour episode available to livestream on Peacock.

Who will be in the SNL Anniversary Special?

Performers pulling double duty with the concert and the special episode include Bad Bunny and Miley Cyrus.

Other celebrity appearances will include those of John Mulaney, Ayo Edebiri, Quinta Brunson, Tom Hanks, Sabrina Carpenter, Adam Driver, Dave Chappelle, Kim Kardashian, Woody Harrelson, Scarlett Johansson, Steve Martin, Martin Short, Paul Simon, Robert De Niro, Pedro Pascal and Peyton Manning.

RELATED: ‘SNL50: The Anniversary Special’ Adds Adam Sandler, Amy Poehler, Chris Rock, Eddie Murphy & More Guests – Update

Additional A-list appearances announced include those of Chris Rock, Tina Fey, Will Ferrell, Amy Poehler, Kristen Wiig, Adam Sandler, Seth Meyers, Pete Davidson, Maya Rudolph, Chevy Chase, Kate McKinnon, Molly Shannon, Jimmy Fallon, Eddie Murphy, Jason Sudeikis, Kenan Thompson, Fred Armisen, Garrett Morris, Laraine Newman, Will Forte, Tracy Morgan, Jane Curtain and more.
